task.title: Creating a GitHub Account
task.shortdesc: Create a GitHub account to serve as your identity on GitHub.

taskbody.context: Before you start working on GitHub, you must first create your own personal account. Use this procedure to create your free and personal account.

step.cmd: On a browser instance, navigate to: .
On the top right hand corner, click Sign up.
In the popup dialog that displays, enter your email ID and a strong password.
Click Continue to create a free personal account to sign in to GitHub.
